amendment.description: Amendment sought to maintain FY 2009 funding levels for the Federal Air Marshals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-183 to maintain current (FY2009) funding for the Federal Air Marshals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 294 (Roll no. 440).
